name: Das Gold den Vaterland! LCCN2004665849 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Das Gold den Vaterland! Abstract: Poster shows a medallion designed by Hermann Hosaeus with the motto: Gold gab ich zur Wehr, Eisen nahm ich zur Ehr. The medallion depicts a woman in profile holding a medal on a chain in her outstretched hand. Text urges people to increase German gold reserves by bringing jewelry to gold dealers. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 93 x 142 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Bernhard.; Stamped in ink on poster: Goldankaufsstelle Zweibrücken, Geschättsraum, Rheinische Creditsbank...iale.; Title from item.
